headline.main: LENINGRAD SIEGE BITTER, SAY NAZIS; Russians Reported Hurling Great Masses of Men Into Fight to Ease Pressure

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Sept. 25 -- Leningrad Is still being shelled unremittingly by guns of many calibers from German field positions. Reich land forces are reported by the official news agency, D.N.B., to have tightened the noose about that beleaguered metropolis.
